overview: “Please Make Me Lesbian!” lives on in part 6, as Brandi Love, Lily Carter, Malena Morgan, Zoey Holloway, Bree Daniels, and Julia Ann strut their stuff and show how easy it is for a women to seduce anyone – even another women. It’s almost diabolical how calculating and subtle their movements are, but by the time Bree Daniels realizes it, it’s too late!
tagline: The Shocking Story Of A Young Woman Craving Her Step-Mother's Attention!
title: Please Make Me Lesbian! 6
